title: Devi Lakshmi Pendant Set with Emerald, Ruby, and Diamond Detailing
materials: 589 stones). Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster.
features: Features Goddess Lakshmi seated on a lotus. The design incorporates peacocks embellished with ruby accents, diamond-studded motifs, and spherical drops in a filigree style. Intricate craftsmanship inspired by traditional temple jewellery, creating a divine and opulent look. Delicate diamond settings accentuate the brilliance of the gemstones.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Emerald Green
and dazzling White Diamonds. The traditional color combination exudes regal elegance.
occasions: and festivals like Diwali and Ugadi. Also a sophisticated choice for modern celebrations and formal events.
description: A true embodiment of South Indian artistry, this pendant brings blessings and prosperity. The Lakshmi design holds immense cultural and spiritual significance. Meticulously handcrafted with high-quality gemstones and Hyderabadi gold polish, ensuring lasting beauty and value. Makes a treasured heirloom piece for generations to come.
